connection.scanHint: Scan to find paired OBD devices.
connection.ecuNoResponse: ECU not responding. Turn on ignition.

dashboard.batteryLowDesc: Battery voltage is at {{voltage}}. Start vehicle or charge. ECU communication may be lost at low voltage.
dashboard.batteryWarnDesc: Battery voltage {{voltage}}. Be careful during long operations.

expertise.historyFoundDesc: This vehicle has {{count}} previous records. You can review the history below.
expertise.manualVinDesc: If the vehicle ECU does not share the VIN automatically, you can type it here.
expertise.vinRequiredDesc: VIN must be detected automatically or entered manually to save a record.
expertise.missingInfoDesc: Please fill in the Make and Model fields.
expertise.connRequiredDesc: Please connect to the vehicle first to start this operation.

service.safetyWarningDesc:
During this operation:

‚Ä¢ Ignition must be ON
‚Ä¢ Engine must be OFF
‚Ä¢ Do not start the vehicle

Do you want to continue?
service.step1Desc:
All saved Trouble Codes (DTC) and Check Engine light will be cleared. Fuel trim values will be reset.

This action cannot be undone!
service.step2Desc:
An electrical reset (Hard Reset) will be sent to the engine brain. Functions like battery disconnect/reconnect.

‚ö†Ô∏è Ineffective on unsupported ECUs. Will not cause harm.
service.completedDesc: Service operations completed successfully. You may restart the vehicle.
service.hardResetDesc:
All service operations completed successfully.

‚Ä¢ Trouble codes cleared
‚Ä¢ Fuel trims reset
‚Ä¢ ECU reset

You may restart the vehicle.

info.desc:
Professional motorcycle and vehicle diagnostic application.
Compatible with all vehicles.
info.upgradeAlertDesc: MotoCortex is currently in development. As an early user, all pro features are unlocked for you. Your feedback is very valuable!
info.thanksDesc: Thank you for your feedback. You can leave us a review on the Play Store.

live.title: LIVE MONITORING SENSORS
live.content:
Monitor RPM, Speed, Engine Temperature, Throttle Position, Battery Voltage, Engine Load, Intake Air Temperature, and Manifold Pressure (MAP) in real-time.

Values refresh 1-5 times per second depending on Bluetooth speed. You can interact directly with the vehicle via UDS / OBD commands in the terminal.

expertise.title: DIAGNOSTICS & WARRANTY
expertise.content:
The app uses ECU codes to detect faults. VIN and recorded mileage are retrieved.

Additionally, distance traveled with the Check Engine light is calculated to determine hitstorical faults. Reports can be shared via PDF or messaging platforms.

tests.title: BATTERY / PERFORMANCE TESTS
tests.content:
Battery test consists of 3 stages: Resting, Cranking, and Idle Charge tests to measure battery/regulator health.

Performance test measures 0-60 and 0-100 km/h acceleration values with 50ms margin of error using your phone's processor and vehicle's live speed data.

hardware.title: HARDWARE COMPATIBILITY
hardware.content: ELM327 Bluetooth (v1.5) is recommended. Some advanced codes may not work with low-quality v2.1 CLONE hardware. Get highest speed with premium adapters like vLinker and OBDLink.

warnings.title: IMPORTANT WARNINGS
warnings.content:
‚Ä¢ Ignition must be ON, Engine must be OFF during trouble code clearing or ECU Reset.
‚Ä¢ Do not send Reset to a running vehicle.
‚Ä¢ Not every vehicle may support all sensors, unsupported sensors show "--".

battery.title: BATTERY & CRANKING TEST
battery.restingStatus: Ignition on, engine off... Reading battery voltage...
battery.crankingStatus: START THE ENGINE NOW! (5 seconds measurement)
battery.voltageError: Voltage could not be read. Check the connection.

steps.1: 1. Ignition on, engine off ‚Üí Resting voltage measured
steps.2: 2. Start the engine when "START THE ENGINE NOW" appears
steps.3: 3. Lowest voltage during startup is recorded (5s)
steps.4: 4. Charging/regulator voltage measured with engine running

battery.warning: Do not disconnect Bluetooth during the test.

freeze.title: FREEZE FRAME
freeze.desc: Reads engine parameters at the moment the Check Engine light turned on. This data provides critical info for diagnosis.
freeze.noDtcs: No fault codes stored. Freeze Frame data may not be available.
freeze.noData: No freeze frame data found. Vehicle may not support this feature.
freeze.techDesc:
‚Ä¢ OBD-II Mode 02: Freeze Frame Data
‚Ä¢ PID 020C00: RPM at fault
‚Ä¢ PID 020D00: Speed at fault
‚Ä¢ PID 020500: Coolant temp at fault

This data belongs to the last fault code. Clearing codes will also clear freeze frame data.

perf.title: PERFORMANCE TEST
perf.idle: Press the button and prepare to move.
perf.howDesc:
1. Press "Start Test" button
2. Vehicle must be stationary (Speed = 0)
3. Timer starts automatically when you move
4. 0-60 km/h and 0-100 km/h times are recorded

‚ö†Ô∏è Perform this test in a safe area!
